DOC.brief_summary: To investigate bioavailability/bioequivalence Brivaracetam oral tablet ( 10 mg , 50 mg , 75 mg 100 mg ) Brivaracetam intravenous injection ( 100 mg ) healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Brivaracetam Oral Tablet ( 10 mg , 50 mg , 75 mg 100 mg ) Brivaracetam Injection ( 100 mg ) Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subject healthy male female volunteer age 1855 year inclusive Subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.0 30.0 kg/m^2 weight least 50 kg ( male ) 45 kg ( female ) Subject normal vital sign value , Electrocardiograms ( ECGs ) clinical laboratory value Female subject negative pregnancy test nonchildbearing potential Volunteer participate participate clinical study investigational drug another Investigational Medicinal Product ( IMP ) within last 3 month Volunteer healthy ( eg , take drug treatment , excessive amount alcohol , cigarettes caffeine , medical emotional/psychological problem , drug/alcohol abuse , abnormal safety parameter ) Subject intolerance allergy compound relate drug
